title: WTB: T213 Coupon Cigarette St. Louis Nat. cards
author: bbcardzman

posts.post_title: WTB: T213 Coupon Cigarette St. Louis Nat. cards
posts.post_content:
I have been a Cardinals team set collector for years and since finding net54 have turned my interests more toward pre-war cards. Like many here, I just love the T206 set and have finally finished one of each Cardinal player, except of course the O'Hara, which I cannot afford. I will eventually try for as many different backs as I can, but I have just become interested in the T213 Coupon Cigarette cards because they use some of the same pictures as the T206 set but with different team designations. 
I just picked up a Jack Warhop, St. Louis Nat. card and found out that he only played for the Yankees and never even played for the Cardinals. (Thanks, Adam)
I have also seen Owen Wilson in his Pittsburgh uniform like on the T206 card and has him as a Cardinal also, and both the Miller Huggins cards that list him as a Cardinal in his Cincinnati uniform.
If anyone has any T213 Coupon Cigarette Cardinals cards for sale I would be interested, if not too expensive. 
Thanks - Eric
